## VirtualBaseItemProps.isScrolling property

Is the owning component being actively scrolled? Used to change how the item is rendered depending on scroll state.

Only defined if [VirtualBaseProps.useIsScrolling](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.useisscrolling.md) is true.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isScrolling?: boolean;
```
